metadata.title: CVE-2015-5132 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.232 on Windows and OS Xand before 11.2.202.508 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 18.0.0.199, Adobe AIRSDK before 18.0.0.199, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 18.0.0.199allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors, adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2015-5131 and CVE-2015-5133.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5132` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.508ubuntu0.14.04.1').
